SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 22nd AUGUST, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
At 4.45 a.m. this morning we attacked the enemy's position between the SOMME and the ANCRE. No details have yet been received.
On the battle front between BEAUCOURT and MOYENVILLE our line runs:- west of MIRAUMONT, east of ACHIET-LE-PETIT, west of ACHIET-LE-GRAND, east of the railway east of COURCELLES, west of HAMELINCOURT. We repulsed strong counter-attacks yesterday afternoon in front of MIRAUMONT and ACHIET-LE-GRAND. Fresh counter-attacks are reported to have developed again this morning at HIRAUMONT and IRLES. On this front we took between 2,000 and 3,000 prisoners and a few guns yesterday.
On the LYS FRONT we have made progress cast and north-east of MERVILLE and our troops are on the outskirts of NEUF BERQUIN.
French Front.
On the battle front north-west of SOISSONS during the night French troops occupied GUNY and BRETIGNY.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
22nd August, 1918.
Issued at 12.40 p.m.
